body_html:
i'm targeting to merge #2801 and #2800 this week.

Since they are so dependent on each other, can you please make a combined single PR for commits on both? I want to see contbuild pass and merge. Also a rebase is good because some big changes went in via #2805

Lastly, thank you. i am going to reach out to you privately for continuous builds etc. i can set them up as soon as these two PRs are merged.

body:
i'm targeting to merge https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2801 and https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2800 this week.

Since they are so dependent on each other, can you please make a combined single PR for commits on both? I want to see contbuild pass and merge. Also a rebase is good because some big changes went in via https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/pull/2805

Lastly, thank you. i am going to reach out to you privately for continuous builds etc. i can set them up as soon as these two PRs are merged.
